00017 #include "MisrReadData.h"
00018 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 #include "MisrError.h"
00021 #include <string.h>
00022 #include <ctype.h>
00023 /* M_PI is not defined in math.h in Linux unless __USE_BSD is defined */
00024 /* and you can define it at the gcc command-line if -ansi is set */
00025 #ifndef __USE_BSD
00026 # define __USE_BSD
00027 #endif
00028 #include <math.h>
00029 #include <hdf.h>
00030 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00031 
00041 MTKt_status MtkReadL1B2(
00042   const char *filename,     
00043   const char *gridname,     
00044   const char *fieldname,    
00045   MTKt_Region region,       
00046   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00047   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00048 {
00049   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00050   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status code for error macros */
00051   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS File id */
00052   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF return status */
00053 
00054   if (filename == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00055 
00056   /* Open file. */
00057   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00058   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00059 
00060   /* Read data. */
00061   status = MtkReadL1B2Fid(fid, gridname, fieldname, region, databuf, mapinfo);
00062   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00063 
00064   /* Close file. */
00065   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00066   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00067   fid = FAIL;
00068 
00069   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00070  ERROR_HANDLE:
00071   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00072   return status_code;
00073 }
00074 
00081 MTKt_status MtkReadL1B2Fid(
00082   int32 fid,                
00083   const char *gridname,     
00084   const char *fieldname,    
00085   MTKt_Region region,       
00086   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf, 
00087   MTKt_MapInfo *mapinfo      )
00088 {
00089   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00090   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status code for error macros */
00091   MTKt_FileType filetype;   /* File type */
00092   MTKt_MapInfo tmpmap = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00093                                 /* Temp Map info structure */
00094   MTKt_MapInfo map = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00095                                 /* Map info structure */
00096   MTKt_DataBuffer buf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00097                                 /* Data buffer structure */
00098   MTKt_DataBuffer radrdqi = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00099                 /* Radiance/RDQI Data buffer structure */
00100   MTKt_DataBuffer conv_factor = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00101                 /* Brf conversion factor */
00102   MTKt_DataBuffer scale_factor = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00103                 /* Radiance scale factor */
00104   MTKt_DataBuffer fill_value = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00105                 /* Radiance fill_value */
00106   MTKt_DataBuffer solar_irradiance = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00107                 /* Solar Irradiance */
00108   MTKt_DataBuffer sun_distance_au = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00109                 /* Sun distance in AU */
00110   double sun_distance_au_squared; /* Sun distance squared (AU) */
00111   char grid[MAXSTR];        /* Grid to read */
00112   char field[MAXSTR];       /* Field to read */
00113   char fieldstr[MAXSTR];    /* Field string */
00114   char *fieldarr[2];        /* Field array */
00115   char *sp;         /* Pointer to string */
00116   int lf;           /* Line index scale factor */
00117   int sf;           /* Sample index scale factor */
00118   int l;            /* Line index */
00119   int s;            /* Sample index */
00120 
00121   if (gridname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00122   if (fieldname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00123 
00124   /* ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00125   /* Parse fieldname to determine unpacking or unscaling method */
00126   /* ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00127 
00128   /* Make a working copy of fieldname */
00129   strncpy(fieldstr, fieldname, MAXSTR);
00130   fieldarr[0] = fieldstr;
00131 
00132   /* Separate band from base field, point fieldarr[1] to null terminator */
00133   /* of fieldstr if there are now spaces in fieldstr, else just fail */
00134   if ((sp = strchr(fieldstr, ' ')) != NULL) {
00135     *sp = '\0';
00136     fieldarr[1] = ++sp;
00137 
00138     /* Convert to lower case for comparison */
00139     while (*sp != '\0') { 
00140       *sp = (char)tolower((int)*sp);
00141       sp++;
00142     }
00143   } else if ((sp = strchr(fieldstr, '\0')) != NULL) {
00144     fieldarr[1] = sp;
00145   } else {
00146     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00147   }
00148 
00149   /* ------------------------------------------------------- */
00150   /* Determine which unpacking or unscaling method and do it */
00151   /* ------------------------------------------------------- */
00152 
00153   if (strncmp(fieldarr[1], "radiance", MAXSTR) == 0) {
00154 
00155     /* Radiance */
00156 
00157     field[0] = '\0';
00158     strncat(field, fieldarr[0], MAXSTR);
00159     strncat(field, " ", MAXSTR);
00160     strncat(field, "Radiance/RDQI", MAXSTR);
00161 
00162     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &radrdqi, &map);
00163     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00164 
00165     status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, field, &fill_value);
00166     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00167 
00168     /* If filetype is TERRAIN adjust fill value to account for obscured by
00169        topography flag. */
00170     status = MtkFileTypeFid(fid, &filetype);
00171     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00172     if (filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_GM || filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_LM)
00173       fill_value.data.u16[0][0] -= 4;
00174 
00175     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(radrdqi.nline, radrdqi.nsample, MTKe_float, 
00176                    &buf);
00177     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00178 
00179     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, "Scale factor", &scale_factor);
00180     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00181 
00182     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00183       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00184     if (radrdqi.data.u16[l][s] < fill_value.data.u16[0][0]) {
00185       buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)((radrdqi.data.u16[l][s] >> 2) * 
00186                       scale_factor.data.d[0][0]);
00187     } else {
00188       buf.data.f[l][s] = 0.0;
00189     }
00190       }
00191     }
00192 
00193     MtkDataBufferFree(&radrdqi);
00194     MtkDataBufferFree(&scale_factor);
00195     MtkDataBufferFree(&fill_value);
00196 
00197   } else if (strncmp(fieldarr[1], "scaled radiance", MAXSTR) == 0 ||
00198          strncmp(fieldarr[1], "dn", MAXSTR) == 0) {
00199 
00200     /* Scaled Radiance (DN) */
00201 
00202     field[0] = '\0';
00203     strncat(field, fieldarr[0], MAXSTR);
00204     strncat(field, " ", MAXSTR);
00205     strncat(field, "Radiance/RDQI", MAXSTR);
00206 
00207     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &buf, &map);
00208     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00209 
00210     status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, field, &fill_value);
00211     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00212 
00213     /* If filetype is TERRAIN adjust fill value to account for obscured by
00214        topography flag. */
00215     status = MtkFileTypeFid(fid, &filetype);
00216     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00217     if (filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_GM || filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_LM)
00218       fill_value.data.u16[0][0] -= 4;
00219 
00220     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00221       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00222     if (buf.data.u16[l][s] < fill_value.data.u16[0][0]) {
00223       buf.data.u16[l][s] = buf.data.u16[l][s] >> 2;
00224     } else {
00225       buf.data.u16[l][s] = 0;
00226     }
00227       }
00228     }
00229 
00230     MtkDataBufferFree(&fill_value);
00231 
00232   } else if (strncmp(fieldarr[1], "rdqi", MAXSTR) == 0) {
00233 
00234     /* RDQI */
00235 
00236     field[0] = '\0';
00237     strncat(field, fieldarr[0], MAXSTR);
00238     strncat(field, " ", MAXSTR);
00239     strncat(field, "Radiance/RDQI", MAXSTR);
00240 
00241     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &radrdqi, &map);
00242     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00243 
00244     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(radrdqi.nline, radrdqi.nsample, MTKe_uint8, 
00245                    &buf);
00246     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00247 
00248     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00249       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00250     buf.data.u8[l][s] = (MTKt_uint8)(radrdqi.data.u16[l][s] & 0x0003);
00251       }
00252     }
00253 
00254     MtkDataBufferFree(&radrdqi);
00255 
00256   } else if (strncmp(fieldarr[1], "equivalent reflectance", MAXSTR) == 0) {
00257 
00258     /* Equivalent Reflectance */
00259 
00260     field[0] = '\0';
00261     strncat(field, fieldarr[0], MAXSTR);
00262     strncat(field, " ", MAXSTR);
00263     strncat(field, "Radiance/RDQI", MAXSTR);
00264 
00265     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &radrdqi, &map);
00266     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00267 
00268     status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, field, &fill_value);
00269     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00270 
00271     /* If filetype is TERRAIN adjust fill value to account for obscured by
00272        topography flag. */
00273     status = MtkFileTypeFid(fid, &filetype);
00274     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00275     if (filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_GM || filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_LM)
00276       fill_value.data.u16[0][0] -= 4;
00277 
00278     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(radrdqi.nline, radrdqi.nsample, MTKe_float, 
00279                    &buf);
00280     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00281 
00282     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, "Scale factor", &scale_factor);
00283     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00284 
00285     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, "std_solar_wgted_height",
00286                 &solar_irradiance);
00287     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00288 
00289     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, "SunDistanceAU",
00290                 &sun_distance_au);
00291     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00292 
00293     sun_distance_au_squared = sun_distance_au.data.d[0][0] * 
00294       sun_distance_au.data.d[0][0];
00295 
00296     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00297       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00298     if (radrdqi.data.u16[l][s] < fill_value.data.u16[0][0]) { 
00299       buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)(M_PI * sun_distance_au_squared *
00300                       ((radrdqi.data.u16[l][s] >> 2) *
00301                       scale_factor.data.d[0][0]) /
00302                       solar_irradiance.data.f[0][0]);
00303     } else {
00304       buf.data.f[l][s] = 0.0;
00305     }
00306       }
00307     }
00308 
00309     MtkDataBufferFree(&radrdqi);
00310     MtkDataBufferFree(&scale_factor);
00311     MtkDataBufferFree(&fill_value);
00312     MtkDataBufferFree(&solar_irradiance);
00313     MtkDataBufferFree(&sun_distance_au);
00314 
00315   } else if (strncmp(fieldarr[1], "brf", MAXSTR) == 0) {
00316 
00317     /* Brf */
00318 
00319     field[0] = '\0';
00320     strncat(field, fieldarr[0], MAXSTR);
00321     strncat(field, " ", MAXSTR);
00322     strncat(field, "Radiance/RDQI", MAXSTR);
00323 
00324     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, field, region, &radrdqi, &map);
00325     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00326 
00327     status = MtkFillValueGetFid(fid, gridname, field, &fill_value);
00328     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status)
00329 
00330     /* If filetype is TERRAIN adjust fill value to account for obscured by
00331        topography flag. */
00332     status = MtkFileTypeFid(fid, &filetype);
00333     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00334     if (filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_GM || filetype ==  MTK_GRP_TERRAIN_LM)
00335       fill_value.data.u16[0][0] -= 4;
00336 
00337     grid[0] = '\0';
00338     strncat(grid, "BRF Conversion Factors", MAXSTR);
00339     field[0] = '\0';
00340     strncat(field, fieldarr[0], MAXSTR);
00341     strncat(field, "ConversionFactor", MAXSTR);
00342 
00343     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, grid, field, region, &conv_factor, &tmpmap);
00344     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00345 
00346     status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(radrdqi.nline, radrdqi.nsample, MTKe_float, 
00347                    &buf);
00348     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00349 
00350     status = MtkGridAttrGetFid(fid, gridname, "Scale factor", &scale_factor);
00351     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status)
00352 
00353     lf = radrdqi.nline / conv_factor.nline;
00354     sf = radrdqi.nsample / conv_factor.nsample;
00355     for (l = 0; l < buf.nline; l++) {
00356       for (s = 0; s < buf.nsample; s++) {
00357     if (radrdqi.data.u16[l][s] < fill_value.data.u16[0][0] &&
00358         conv_factor.data.f[l/lf][s/sf] > 0.0) { 
00359       buf.data.f[l][s] = (MTKt_float)((radrdqi.data.u16[l][s] >> 2) *
00360                       scale_factor.data.d[0][0] *
00361                       conv_factor.data.f[l/lf][s/sf]);
00362     } else {
00363       buf.data.f[l][s] = 0.0;
00364     }
00365       }
00366     }
00367 
00368     MtkDataBufferFree(&radrdqi);
00369     MtkDataBufferFree(&conv_factor);
00370     MtkDataBufferFree(&scale_factor);
00371     MtkDataBufferFree(&fill_value);
00372 
00373   } else {
00374 
00375     /* Native Radiance/RDQI or Geometric Parameters */
00376 
00377     status = MtkReadRawFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, region, &buf, &map);
00378     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00379 
00380   }
00381 
00382   *databuf = buf;
00383   *mapinfo = map;
00384 
00385   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00386  ERROR_HANDLE:
00387   MtkDataBufferFree(&radrdqi);
00388   MtkDataBufferFree(&conv_factor);
00389   MtkDataBufferFree(&scale_factor);
00390   MtkDataBufferFree(&fill_value);
00391   MtkDataBufferFree(&buf);
00392   MtkDataBufferFree(&solar_irradiance);
00393   MtkDataBufferFree(&sun_distance_au);
00394   return status_code;
00395 }
